website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a powerful hose reel that's built to last and works as promised, the installation process is well worth the effort if you choose this top-of-the-line option.
pros: A popular model by a trusted name in the industry that earns praise for its smooth operating rollers and solid steel build throughout
cons: It's heavier than most, making it challenging to install in some locations such as ceilings
The hose fittings have been known to leak, but this doesn't affect the reel performance

customer_reviews.title: Beware. This is not the quality product you may think.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a quality made product as one would expect at this price level. The bright yellow color of the air hose faded almost immediately after purchase to a very unsightly color. I have my reel stored inside in a non commercial setting. What was once a good looking product no looks as if it’s been in commercial use for 10 years. Beware! I would have thought such an expensive product would maintain its disposition for more than a month. Shame on Goodyear for selling a subpar item!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Heinemann

customer_reviews.title: Ratchet spring broke under 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, ratchet spring failed in under a year. If you use your hoses regularly do not expect this to last. Seller needs to take returns on faulty items. Will not purchase from this seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Reel return spring broke after second use.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously poor quality and zero response from vendor (Great Circle USA) after four attempts at contacting for resolution. Looks like it's mine though, since I missed the return window by literally 12 hours. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Deplorable GC USA

customer_reviews.title: Good looking retractable Air Hose reel!
customer_reviews.text: Came in today on time and as advertised. I used 1/2 x 2 1/2 bolts and a little Teflon tape. No leaks and can’t wait to start using it! One piece of advice if you are installing the unit up high and by yourself unreel the unit so that the majority of the hose and weight is on the ground before climbing the latter. The weight difference should allow you to complete the install without killing yourself.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just long enough to exit the return window.
customer_reviews.text: Went ahead and spent the $ on a good brand and hose. I have been very careful not to kink or run over this hose. 2 months old and now needs a new hose. Managed to pass the return window. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Defect
customer_reviews.text: I would like to receive a replacement nut as the one provided has a defect. As you can see there is a hole in the brass nut and it does not hold pressure
customer_reviews.author: Dan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Goodyear Air Hose
customer_reviews.text: We just installed this yesterday 11/11/18. First of all, very frustrating that there was not a template to show where to put the holes into the wall for install. The item was heavy and it took both of us to hold it up. We made our own template. So we finally got it installed to the wall. I will add additional comments about the product once we have a chance to us it. Ask any questions you want anytime. Also, this was a return open box item as the hose was criss cross on the reel.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality hobby shop air hose reel
customer_reviews.text: I'm using two of these air hose reels in my automotive hobby shop; one for "oiled" air for air tool use and one for "unoiled" dry air for paint gun, plasma cutter, tire filling uses . The overall quality appears to be very good with nice fit and finish and decent material build quality. The reel extends and retracts smoothly and the roller guides are smooth. The hose supplied on the reel appears to be good quality. There were no air leaks found after hooking the system up and leak testing. I expect to get many years of use out of these hose reels; time will tell. Bonus; the Goodyear branding and blue/yellow color looks good in the shop!
customer_reviews.author: N. Leann Janson

customer_reviews.title: Good reel with minor manufacturing flaw
customer_reviews.text: This hose reel works great. Compared to the Kobalt reel it is the hands down winner and is built much more sturdy. The only issue I had with this is the mounting holes were not drilled correctly. The instructions said that the holes were half inch, but only 1 of the holes would fit a half inch bolt. Of coarse this is relatively easy to fix with a step drill bit.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: JUNK !!!!! NOT GOOD YEAR BRAND
customer_reviews.text: Not a Good Year product. But a copy from china. Hope this will last little longer then Harbor Tools hose did... well that didnt last long at all..... my hose swell up already from maybe 10 time use around the house just used it to air up car tire and kids bikes tires and its done. On the hose it said 300 psi my compresor maxing out at 120 psi.... w
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: This hose reel is good looking and operates well
customer_reviews.text: This hose reel is good looking and seems to operate well. The frame is made of a lighter gauge steel but it seems to hold up well. The hose provided with the reel is sturdy and rolls in and out effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality reel and hose for the price of a quality hose alone.
customer_reviews.text: This seem very well made even though it is made in China it appears to be a genuine Goodyear licensed product. Smooth action and even tension throughout the hose length. One of the mounting bolts is hard to access because it lines up with the edge of the reel so you need to install and tighten it while the other bolts are loose. However, this is a really nice product for the price of just a high end hose.
customer_reviews.author: J. Masters

customer_reviews.title: Great reel GARBAGE HOSE
customer_reviews.text: Beware the hose is garbage, I got this on Wed and today is Sunday first time my husband used it, he was super excited, mounted it etc and the hose busted and drenched us both! The only reason we are keeping it is for the reel mount and if we can’t find a better compatible hose it may go back!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Seems Like Good Quality - Come With Lead hose
customer_reviews.text: I installed this today, pretty simple. I made a template of the mounting base out of heavy photo paper so I could pre-dril the holes. The description says (lead-in hose not included) but mine came with one. I ordered a lead hose separately because of the description, I will need to return it. I'll update this review if my opinion changes.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty equipment.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very high. This thing is heavy duty and extremely heavy so if you want it mounted up high, get a helper. The price made me prepare for a cheaply built unit but this guy is of professional quality. The size is larger than I expected, perfect for the garage but not for the service vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: daniel shupe

customer_reviews.title: Good reel, no name hose.
customer_reviews.text: After six months of light use, the hose reel is holding up great. The yellow house it came with has turned brown where it is exposed to air, it's not a Goodyear brand hose, so the branding is somewhat misleading. I'll use it until it bursts, then replace the hose with a proper quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my garage
customer_reviews.text: I finally bit the bullet and purchased this Goodyear air hose reel. It is quite heavy making overhead installation somewhat of a chore but not impossible. The unit seems quite sturdy and will probably last a lifetime. A little pricey but in the long run it will be worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Voice Over

customer_reviews.title: Fine machine
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Feels like the rewind mechanism will last a lifetime. While pulling out hose, it goes rooolll click click click rooollllll click click click -you have to stop pulling during the ratchet clicks which sometimes is a bit of a trick to find/time. Kinda wish it clicked more frequently but it's not a deal breaker
customer_reviews.author: J. F. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Have only been using it for a few weeks but works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty air hose reel that does what it is supposed to do. Feels well made and the rollers function well. Have only been using it for a few weeks but works great so far!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Goodyear electric cord retractor, and was very pleased. I decided to take a chance on this, and I am thrilled that I did. This is exactly what I was looking for. And at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Hard to please

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: My husband tried out some cheaper brands and after a couple of returns, he finally bought the "spendier" one. He couldn't be more pleased. He's remarked several times that "honey, it was totally worth it." Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: H. S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Really like all the capabilities of this unit. It has exceeded my expectations on quality as Goodyear does! This unit has excellent extention and retraction. Would reccomend for tight spaces! Don't forget to get the whip!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Good air hose reel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air hose reel for my garage. It was easy to install and there were no leaks. The reel tension was good coming out of the box. The reel spring works good, it was easy to stop the reel when pull the hose out and when you needed to wind the reel back up it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I strapped it on to my 8 gallon compressor and it's now portable. Great quality. I added a water filter, and made a custom wooden mount to attach, and it's solid.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice reel
customer_reviews.text: I've had this reel about 6 months now and use it often, works as it's supposed to, no complaints, strong tension, no leaks, quality hose, Nice reel Installation will take some brains and effort, it's also very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Mounting bracket is less than perfect. You need to mount to a piece of ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent reel, quality hose and fittings. Mounting bracket is less than perfect. You need to mount to a piece of wood on a bench first and then hang the whole board/assembly to a wall. Would also like it to have supports on both sides not just one as it tends to wobble a little. A lot cheaper than a cox reel but a few corners were cut. All in all good product
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: High quality - but research a mounting spot!
customer_reviews.text: This thing weights a bit and can’t be mounted to any plain wall / I’d was even hesitant to mount to 2X4 studs. Mounted to a mounting board and into a ceiling Joyce. Holds steady!
customer_reviews.author: 69 Camaro

customer_reviews.title: Great Value... Works great!  No air leaks either.
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised, but this really worked great and was not expensive. I mounted it under my work bench. Works great and the hose is supple in the cold. I like how I could adjust the rollers in a couple minutes to mount it upside down. Hose retracts, no problem. No air leaks. Smells like Good Year tires! Hmmm.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Cheap China Junk
customer_reviews.text: I assumed this would have a USA made goodyear hose, why would someone assume such a thing...This thing is ok, but I can't recommend buying it. The brass on the hose end is super soft and hard to tighten with the correct wrench without destroying it. I can't get the air coupler on tight enough for the threads not to leak and the flats are all rounded off now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: The reel works very smoothly. It rewinds comfortably without whipping back. It's much nicer than wrapping up a 40 to 50 Ft. hose on the ground then hanging it on a wall. Longer mounting bolts to get through a 2x6 would have been nice. I would recommend the Goodyear.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Seems good.
customer_reviews.text: Great so far. Seems to be great quality, will certainly update if I have any issues. It will be used heavily. January 2020
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hose for my wood shop. The hose is top quality, and works exactly the way you want it to. I had an issue with the drum winding up, as I had taken it apart to install it (don’t recommend doing this) - customer service team sent me a new one right away. I recommend buying this because the quality is superior, but the customer service has your back too in case something fails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STURDY AND WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: It will take little thinking on how you'll mount this product. If you mount it on the ceiling, high on a wall, you'll have to deal with its weight while securing. It does not come with a connector hose. If you don't have one already, you'll need to purchase one. Goodyear has one on Amazon for $14.50. Other than that, it appears to be well made and should serve me well.
customer_reviews.author: Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hose
customer_reviews.text: The hose is terrible. discolored in a week. Went from yellow to brown. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Whetzel

customer_reviews.title: Great product even better seller!!
customer_reviews.text: After years of swearing I would write more reviews ..... this one just screamed at me DO IT!! Great product but even better seller. We purchased about a year ago. Love how this has changed how we use air tools in our garage. The recoil spring stopped working and all it took was a short and friendly call to a USA based company. Our replacement product is on its way!! Thank you GreatCircleUS!!!
customer_reviews.author: PetersGirl

customer_reviews.title: Top notch and fulfills my retractable pneumatic needs.
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these. Work, home and cottage. Best unit I’ve ever bought. These are the real deal and I would not buy from a different company. I am an engineer and it means a lot to me to by high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexible hose in cold temps
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Was an upgrade from a competitors version that we had for years that was plastic and broke, and the air hose wouldnt coil in the cold. This one has proven itself already to be sturdy, flexible hose in single digit temperature.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewF

customer_reviews.title: Solid heavy duty reel
customer_reviews.text: Just installed so it remains to be seen; however, so far so good. This thing is heavy, well built and solid. It looks like it's going to last a very long time. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nerses Ghazarian

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a air hose real for long time
customer_reviews.text: It works as it should no issues with it for some reason the hose started to stain brown but only the part that I touched the rest of its its steel yellow but its a garage hose its ment to get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Gheorghe Mihalca

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my race trailer. Easy to install, all the parts were there, the spring is powerful and it should last a long time. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaydub

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice air hose reel. Works really well
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's a bright color and stands out. The hose is very pliable and easy to use. I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Gordn Perrott

customer_reviews.title: What my garage was lacking
customer_reviews.text: With all of my vehicles having tire pressure monitoring systems, I find myself servicing tires more than usual. This makes the job a breeze. Easy to install. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Barry

customer_reviews.title: hose has defects
customer_reviews.text: Well built and seems sturdy but less than two weeks in and the hose has a bubble and will more than likely burst soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth operation and seems well made, time will tell ...
customer_reviews.text: Smooth operation and seems well made, time will tell. One minor issue was one of the bolts to the arm wasn't tightened and left a gap where the arm and frame meet. If it wasn't a self locking nut it probably would have fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: craig s

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Should of bought one of these years ago won't lock sometimes
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Detroit

customer_reviews.title: ... a retractable water hose and so far it is good. I had to buy a few fittings so ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a retractable water hose and so far it is good. I had to buy a few fittings so I could attach standard hose accessories but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well made. A couple of installation tips for ceilings since this is heavy. First, make a paper template with the holes rather than trying to hold it up and mark it. Second, unroll the hose before mounting it. It will make the lift easier!
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: Poor mount design
customer_reviews.text: Mount design makes it overly difficult to fasten to wall.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Sitzmann

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty product
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty works great attached to the back of my truck for service calls
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great hose reel, way better than the blue store brand
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, fill tire with air, to use with air tools.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel M Contreras

customer_reviews.title: High quality and affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome hose reel I did put it on top of my two post lift and this looks really good
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why I waited this long to purchase one of these! Works great and is SOOO much easier! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Price is right
customer_reviews.text: I assumed it was made in America with the Goodyear name. It was made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Looks Goods and works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: If you have kids that like turning your garage into a pit area, you need this RETRACTABLE air hose unless you have the desire to continuously roll up air hoses.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel Slayer

customer_reviews.title: Helped out for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Got real tired unrolling the old hose. With this, I just grab and go.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: AN AMAZING PRODUCT AND PERFORMS WONDERFUL. SHIPPING WAS ULTRA FAST TOO.
customer_reviews.author: ED KOEHN

customer_reviews.title: Very good hose reel for the price.
customer_reviews.text: extends and retracts like the higher quality hose reels for much less cost. Hose seems to be made of good quality rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: seems to be holding up well so far
customer_reviews.text: Buy a lot of these they get used a lot so I bought this better brand and so far so good ....time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Thebob

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks great! Feels super sturdy. However when mounting it, its a real hoot to try to get to the two bottom bolt locations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: after 1 yr I'm convinced
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this after reading a lot of reviews. I ended up buying this about a yr ago and have no complaints at all. I use it nearly everyday and have not had a single issue/problem with it. Seems to be well built and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: Second time using it and the hose balloons out. Rated for 300psi and only had 170psi running through the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL ..... Came in a box as if bought in a store - this was a gift. Don't purchase if you want any sort of decent shipping.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sturdy reel
customer_reviews.text: Very Cheap hose coming from a U.S, rubber company very disappointed used six times since July 2019 unrolled hose to check tire pressure big bubble in hose internally came apart glad it didn't explode in my face
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goodyear hose real
customer_reviews.text: great addition to my home garage I place one at each end with central comp.air wouldn't recommend for commercial use but great home shop
customer_reviews.author: Russell Harvey Carmody

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to pull out and retract, that is the best part about this good looking reel.
customer_reviews.author: Jose C.

customer_reviews.title: Hose turns color.
customer_reviews.text: The hose itself turns from the bright yellow to brown after it sits in the air for a month. I have not used it yet just un boxed it and took the plastic off of the hose and reel.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy T.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband's car shop They look great and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The product color is not even close to the picture. The hose is very faded and the blue is pale blue. So disappointed. I thought Goodyear was too notch. Not on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very very sturdy,,,, I'm sure I will never have to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: retracts smoothly
customer_reviews.text: so far so good been using daily for a month now no issues
customer_reviews.author: marli&karl

customer_reviews.title: Great air hose reel
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I researched a ton of hose reals and decided on this one. Very solid and very well built. It's a great real for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: just do it , I wish I had years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I have been coiling up my hoses on the shop floor for years , now I don't have to stumble over them . a time saver and helps when cleaning/ picking up.
customer_reviews.author: richard whitman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected from a Goodyear branded product.
customer_reviews.text: The hose and reel are a good, well built unit. The hose is high pressure but still very flexible. It all works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: julie singleton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second Unit. Works extremely well and decided to add another to our facility. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ironman

customer_reviews.title: One person
customer_reviews.text: One person can install this. I am 65 years old and had no problem putting it on the ceiling of my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Wanted a good quality, stout (not plastic) air hose reel for ...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a good quality, stout (not plastic) air hose reel for mounting in a service truck. I think I made a good decision.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it in my garage. Make it so good looking.
customer_reviews.author: avner tamari

customer_reviews.title: Really nice air hose reel
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to install. It is definitely sturdy and functional. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. The return mechanism is very study and works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if your handy
customer_reviews.text: if you know how these connect, and how to wall mount heavy items, this is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Don’t worry
customer_reviews.text: well made working good so far. it’s aa good year product cmon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: GREAT GOODYEAR QUALITY PRODUCT. COST EFFICIENT AND STILL DURABLE. VERY HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Works great, retracks easily
customer_reviews.text: Works great, retracks easily, locks solid in place, easy to use. I hung my from the ceiling and it is rather heavy to install but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fittings leak
customer_reviews.text: Fittings leak and must be replaced. I also purchased a 3' whip hose from Goodyear and the fittings leak. Seems like a very basic thing to get right. They must have a fitting crimp quality issue. I tried to contact Goodyear but could not find a customer support number for this. Very dissappointing. Not easy to return after installation.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Bird

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this for my place of employment. It works greats, and retracts very easily!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: This is a very heavy, well made reel!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy, well made reel! The Goodyear brand is the kicker though -- this thing looks fantastic! I haven't mounted it yet, but the mechanism works dramatically better than the cheap one it is replacing. You will go through a half dozen of the cheap ones before this one breaks, and this one could be repaired where the others need to be trashed. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to secure overhead
customer_reviews.text: Returned this reel due to it being very hard to mount. My garage air reel is mounted high up and I found it very hard to hold this reel up and at the same time bolt it to the wall. Got a Legacy reel that uses a removable wall mount so all you have to do is secure the reel to the wall mount with a pin. I'm too old for this nonsense. This reel looks to be good quality but not worth the hassle it requires to mount in an elevated location.
customer_reviews.author: Redsvbob

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty and excellent spring action
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, heavy duty and excellent spring action. Only negative was the difficulty in mounting with only one person and the weight of the product. The reel is actually in the way of one of the mounting holes without some disassembly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: sharp looking reel
customer_reviews.text: The reel comes in a good package protection and the color box is strong. There are styrofoam inside to fix the reel in stable during transportation. Although I haven't used it, I check the reel is quite good quality from the construction and the powder coating. Happy to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: AMZTWNO1

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to mount or use the air hose, but it appears well constructed
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous_One

product_meta.title: GOODYEAR Air-Hose-Reel Retractable 3/8" Inch x 50' Feet Long Garage Essential Premium Commercial SBR Hose Max 300 Psi Steel Construction Heavy Duty Spring Driven
product_meta.description: The Goodyear L815153G Air/Water Hose Reel is crafted of heavy duty industrial steel heat treated w/ powder coating resisting against corrosion Reinforced flanged edges stamped steel single guide arm & L-base all light weight & strong ensuring optimal support Premium Commercial SBR Hoses are made of Styrene Butadiene Rubber (SBR or Buna-S) this 3/8" (9 5mm) x 50’ FT Hose has a working pressure of 300PSI/20BAR w/ 1/4” NPT connections for large volume delivery Utilizing double adjustment enclosed multi-position release ratchet spring locking the hose at any desired length Brass swivel joint inlet protecting against leaks + Adjustable Hose Stopper & Non-Snag Rollers Premium SBR has superior bend radius abrasion & puncture resistance & no memory (eliminating kinks) Resistant to Acids Water/Oil Heat Ozone Weather & works in tough conditions of -40°F to 226°F (-40°C to 108°C) for the best advantage for any job Our Reels are OSHA RoHS ISO 9001 14001 CNAS SQC IAF MSHA Listed approved & certified including cull quality tested Goodyear Reels are best suited for indoor/outdoor use night or day DIY or industrial applications allowing for extension to be up out of the way keeping the home/workplace safe Includes bolts fitting the 1/2” (12 7mm) holes to mount (lead-in hose not included) Air Hose Reels are suitable for Air & Water based fluids (NOT PETROLEUM or BIO-FUELS)
feature_bullets: SPECIFICATIONS - This Goodyear Air/Water Hose Reel is crafted of heavy duty industrial steel, heat treated w/ powder coating resisting against corrosion. Reinforced flanged edges, stamped steel single guide arm & L-base all light weight & strong, ensuring optimal support. Premium Commercial SBR Hoses are made of Styrene Butadiene Rubber (SBR or Buna-S), this 3/8" (9.5mm) x 50’ FT Hose has a working pressure of 300PSI/20BAR w/ 1/4” NPT connections for large volume delivery.

EFFICIENT DESIGN & CAPABILITIES - Utilizing double adjustment enclosed multi-position release ratchet spring, locking the hose at any desired length. Brass swivel joint inlet protecting against leaks + Adjustable Hose Stopper & Non-Snag Rollers. Premium SBR has superior: bend radius, abrasion & puncture resistance & no memory (eliminating kinks) Resistant to: Acids, Water/Oil, Heat, Ozone, Weather & works in tough conditions of -40°F to 226°F (-40°C to 108°C), for the best advantage for any job.

SAFETY & PROPER USE - Our Reels are OSHA, RoHS, ISO: 9001, 14001, CNAS, SQC, IAF, MSHA, Listed approved & certified, including cull quality tested. Goodyear Reels are best suited for indoor/outdoor use, night or day, DIY or industrial applications allowing for extension to be up out of the way keeping the home/workplace safe. Includes bolts fitting the 1/2” (12.7mm) holes to mount, (lead-in hose not included). Air Hose Reels are suitable for Air & Water based fluids (NOT PETROLEUM or BIO-FUELS).

The GOODYEAR Appeal - Partner with us & join millions worldwide who empower their everyday lives, by using our cutting edge equipment & supreme advanced technology, to Conquer any task or obstacle. Arise & gain Dominance over your 'sphere of influence' by starting here.

COMMITMENT - GreatCircleUSA is the only authorized seller of Reelworks products, we are committed to providing customers with a stress-free shopping experience. Buy with confidence, we are ALWAYS here to help.
